pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc

Class IMCDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.up.fe.dceg.neptus.imc.IMCDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMessageProtocol<IMCMessage>

    public class IMCDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMessageProtocol<IMCMessage>
    This class loads and holds an IMC definition (XML) and allows creation of compatible messages (factory), parsing and serialization
    Author:
    zp

      • create

        public IMCMessage create(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.Object... values)
        Create a new message and fills it with given values
        Parameters:
        name - The abbreviated name of the message to be created
        values - A list of pairs <field,value> for initializing the message. Example: 
        IMCMessage estimatedState = 
   new IMCMessage("EstimatedState", "x", 10.0, "lat", 0.71, "ref", "NED");
        Returns:
        The created message or null if the given name is not valid
